name: 2 players pong (big chogus)
description:
Left paddle moves up and down using [w] and [s] keys, respectively.

For right paddle, controls are [o] and [l] keys.

Note: sometimes it will not work (keys are not registered, therefore paddles will not move).
The Windows build includes java, that's why it takes 200+mb.

In said case, move the window with the cursor to force focus it, or just restart the app.
